definition: axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: The articulation of the radius and ulna in the arm is a pivot joint.
sentences.chinese: 手臂桡骨和尺骨的连接关节是一个枢轴关节。
大英帝国是以新加坡为枢轴的。

sentences.english: This construction avoids the need for extending the pivot pins through the valve body.
sentences.chinese: 这种结构消除了将枢轴销伸长穿出阀体的必要性。

sentences.english: The star shape stem pivots its way through 6 positions around a 360-degree axis.
sentences.chinese: 恒星形成干枢轴途经6个职位周围360度的轴。

sentences.english: Humanity stands at a pivotal point in it's existence.
sentences.chinese: 人类在它在一个枢轴的点站是存在。

sentences.english: The axle pivot bore is generally aligned with the drive axle.
sentences.chinese: 枢轴的轴孔通常与驱动桥保持一致。

sentences.english: It pivots around and straightens as it extends its mechanical hand.
sentences.chinese: 机器人臂绕枢轴转动并伸直，好像伸出它的机械手。

definition: to rotate about an axis/axis of rotation (math.)
to support/to bear the weight of (a building)
balance (of a watch or clock)/balance wheel
